hero.heading: Symbolica
hero.subheading: Explore, document and share the world's symbolic heritage with our community of enthusiasts

sections.newsletterSub: Subscribe to our newsletter to follow the project's evolution
sections.partnerIntro: Symbolica collaborates with cultural and educational institutions to preserve and share symbolic heritage

howItWorks.intro: An open-source platform to preserve, educate and inspire around cultural symbols

1.title: Photograph
1.desc: Capture and upload photos of symbols you find

3.title: Explore
3.desc: Discover links between symbols across cultures and eras

4.title: Create
4.desc: Generate new patterns inspired by heritage with our AI

callToAction.description: Participate in the preservation and rediscovery of the world's symbolic heritage. An open and collaborative initiative for all culture enthusiasts.
callToAction.support: Project supported by museums, universities and cultural institutions

footer.tagline: An open-source platform dedicated to the discovery, analysis and creation around symbols & cultural patterns.
